member.name: T:Npgsql.GeoJSON.CrsMapEntry
member.summary: An entry which maps the authority to the inclusive range of SRID.

member.name: F:Npgsql.GeoJSON.CrsMap.WellKnown
T:Npgsql.GeoJSON.EwkbGeometryType
member.summary: Represents the identifier of the Well Known Binary representation of a geographical feature specified by the OGC. http://portal.opengeospatial.org/files/?artifact_id=13227 Chapter 6.3.2.7

member.name: T:Npgsql.NpgsqlGeoJSONExtensions
member.summary: Extension allowing adding the GeoJSON plugin to an Npgsql type mapper.

member.name: M:Npgsql.NpgsqlGeoJSONExtensions.UseGeoJson(Npgsql.TypeMapping.INpgsqlTypeMapper,Npgsql.GeoJSON.GeoJSONOptions,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets up GeoJSON mappings for the PostGIS types.
member.param: The type mapper to set up (global or connection-specific)
Options to use when constructing objects.
Specifies that the geography type is used for mapping by default.
